title: NTP Ep. 21 - When Life Doesn't Go as Planned with Rebekah Lyons
description:
What if life doesn't go as planned? We're talking today about surrender and how living surrendered to God sets us free to love Him and love others.

Find Rebekah's devotional here: https://www.amazon.com/Surrendered-Yes-Devotions-Live-Free/dp/0310457572/ref=sr_1_4?dchild=1&keywords=rebekah+lyons&qid=1628558661&sr=8-4

Thanks HelloFresh! HelloFresh.com/madeforthis14 and use code madeforthis14 for up to 14 free meals, plus free shipping!
